Title: 101: What a Data Science Headhunter is Looking For
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Director of Talent Acquisition at Collective[i], Urie Suhr. You will hear about a headhunter's perspective on finding and recruiting talent, learn how to connect with the right people at the right time, and when your years of experience do not match a job description.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/101
